question: What is the main goal of the proposed hybrid model, DeepNWP, in addressing the limitations of numerical weather prediction (NWP) models?
answer: The main goal of the proposed hybrid model, DeepNWP, is to improve the skill of NWP models by reducing the large biases in precipitation predictions, particularly at short-range time scales, by combining the strengths of NWP and state-of-the-art deep learning algorithms.
